thread.title: Salman Khan advised his fans not to watch his films four times in a day
thread.title_full: Salman Khan advised his fans not to watch his films four times in a day

author: Deccan
title: Salman Khan advised his fans not to watch his films four times in a day
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 17, 2015, 16.33 pm Mumbai: Bollywood’s heartthrob Salman Khan, who is currently wowing his fans on small screen with Bigg Boss 9, has collaborated with TVF Qutiyapa. Salman is seen in this funny video along with his make up guy cum secretary Raju shooting on the sets.
Salman is always more than happy to greet his fans but what happens when a fan piles on him and just refuses to leave? Well, something same happened at a TVF shoot where a fan glued to Salman and then, even his father turned out to be his huge fan. Here’s how Salman reacted:
Earlier, TVF Qutiyapa had aslo featured Bollwyood’s king Shah Rukh Khan and now the team is back with this humorous video with Salman Khan.
